about.intro: Welcome to The Paint Doctor! We are family owned and have been in business for over 25 years. We can handle all your auto and marine body needs. Let us make your car or boat look new again. We also restore antique vehicles, gas pumps, and everything collectible. We have very reasonable rates, extremely fast service and can work with your insurance company directly. So give us a call today!

home.intro-body: We can handle all your auto and marine body needs. Let us make your car or boat look new again. We also restore antique vehicles, gas pumps, and everything collectible. We have very reasonable rates, extremely fast service and can work with your insurance company directly. So give us a call today at (608)-635-0323
home.main-paragraph: Whether it's auto paint or collision repair, Paint doctor auto offers easy, affordable and reliable paint and repair services that can turn the car you drive back into the car you love.

contact.contact-card: Stay in-touch with the paint doctor located in Arlington, WI 53911
contact.contact-description: Reach us by phone or email
